## Quarto

Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. To learn more about Quarto see <https://quarto.org>.

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

#loadingpackages

```{r}
#|label: loading packages
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#|label: loading excel file
#loadinginexcelsfileL0fromdropbox
df.dungdecay<- "https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/eb7lz3jzgjvwgouczmkiy/dung-data.xlsx?rlkey=3h56mcpgg8xq0ofj33h6xmj10&st=mac9irs7&dl=1"
download.file(df.dungdecay, destfile="dung-data.xlsx", mode="wb")
df.dungdecay<- read_excel("dung-data.xlsx", sheet="whole_mass_data_calculations")
```
